title: ContextSuite Entity Embeddings
description: Schema for an embedding associated with an entity's content.

label.description: Label of the content that was embedded (e.g., 'Synopsis').

model.description: The model used to generate the embedding (e.g., 'text-embedding-3-small').

content_starts.description: Optional prefix to the content before embedding.

content_ends.description: Optional suffix to the content after embedding.

opening_phrase.description: Optional opening phrase used during embedding generation.

closing_phrase.description: Optional closing phrase used during embedding generation.
